name: pond-digging-calculator
description: Frontend for Pond Digging Calculator - Elm application

scripts.dev: npm run clean:soft && npm run generate:config && npm run build:css && parcel serve public/index.html
scripts.dev:dirty: npm run generate:config && npm run build:css && parcel serve public/index.html
scripts.dev:force-clean: npm run clean && npm run generate:config && npm run build:css && parcel serve public/index.html
scripts.clean:soft: rimraf dist .parcel-cache || echo 'Clean failed (files may be locked) - continuing anyway...'
scripts.build: npm run validate:config && npm run generate:config && npm run format && npm run build:css && parcel build public/index.html
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:css:timeout: powershell -Command "& { $job = Start-Job { tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o public/styles.css --watch=false }; Wait-Job $job -Timeout 10; Stop-Job $job; Remove-Job $job }"
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:timeout || tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o public/styles.css --watch=false
scripts.test:e2e:all-browsers: npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox && npm run test:e2e:edge
scripts.test:e2e:comprehensive: npm run test:e2e:user-journeys && npm run test:e2e:performance && npm run test:e2e:accessibility && npm run test:e2e:mobile
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.validate:full: npm run validate && npm run test:e2e:comprehensive

author: Pond Digging Calculator Team
